t: Mevell Food Grade Mineral Oil for Cutting Boards, Butcher Blocks and Countertops, USP Food Grade, Made in Canada : Amazon.com.au: Home
s: The bottle of mineral oil arrived with a seal under the cap that you need to Peel off. I read reviews of other brands where the oil leaked in the packaging but this was not a problem. There is no scent in the oil and it seems to work well.
